-dvara#M ~MvRuNaiq mayyEqva saqtO&BayE#na BunajAddhvAq itiq tad-gaurA&ha#raqt tasmAqd-gavi# saqtOBayE#na Bu~jjata EqtadvA aqgnEstEjOq yad GRuqtamEqtath sOma#syaq yat payOq ya EqvamaqgnIShOma#yOq stEjOq vEda# tEjaqsvyE#va Ba#vati 
brahmavAqdinO# vadanti kiMdEvaqtya#M paurNamAqsamiti# prAjApaqtyamiti# brUyAqt tEnEndra#M jyEqShThaM puqtraM niqravA#sAyayaqditiq tasmA$- ( ) -jjyEqShThaM puqtraM dhanE#na niqrava#sAyayanti || 14
(aqsyaq - mA - vEdA - && - dyAvA#pRuthiqvyO - ra#bravIq - ditiq tasmA$ - ccaqtvAri# ca) (A2)
